name: YCT-I
description: This is an educational program developed by the Confucius Institute at the University of Valencia (Spain), which allows to prepare the official Chinese level test for children YCT-1 (Young Chinese Test Level I) from examples of examination issued by Hanban.  The YCT-I (YCT-1) test consists of 35 questions divided into two sections, one listening comprehension (20 questions), and reading comprehension (15 questions). Each block has a maximum score of 100 points, and need to get a 120 to pass the test.  Project Lead: Vicent Andreu - Confucius Institute Design & programmer: J. P. Sanchez - Sonotrigger Software Sound Producer: Damian Sanchez - Sonotrigger Image & know: Hanban
